name: Verify '+' button disability in the Cart Modal for 'Discounted' Mocha
description: Verify '+' button is disabled for '(Discounted) Mocha' in the Cart Modal
descriptionHtml: Verify '+' button is disabled for '(Discounted) Mocha' in the Cart Modal

testStage.description: Verify '+' button is disabled for '(Discounted) Mocha' in the Cart Modal

steps.name: Given  I am on the coffee cart menu page
Given  I am on the menu page
When  I select an Espresso drink
Click on cup with title: Espresso
Click on Cup body
And  I select an Espresso drink
Click on cup with title: Espresso
Click on Cup body
And  I select an Espresso drink
Click on cup with title: Espresso
Click on Cup body
Then  I verify Lucky Day option appear
When  I click on "Yes, of course!" button
Click «Yes, of course!»
Click on the element
And  I hover total button on menu page
Then  I verify is dicounted mocha in cart
Count
And  I verify "+" button should be disabled for Discounted Mocha
'+' button is enabled
When  I click on "+" button on discounted mocha
Click on '+' button
'+' button is enabled
And  I verify sum
Count cart
Count cart
